website_summaries.verdict: Desirable price per ounce for a product that ships inside a plastic case to provide a good value.
pros: Gives your irritated skin a soothing feeling after a shave
Helps to quickly heal nicks from shaving
Block is a little larger than some other brands, giving you a longer-lasting product
Corners and edges won’t break off if you keep it in the protective case
Tones the skin without causing pores to clog
cons: Texture is odd, as it seems softer than some other alum blocks

customer_reviews.title: great deodorant
customer_reviews.text: works as deodorant too. been using Alum Blocks for deodorant and hasn't failed me yet. leaves no white chunky residue. doesn't feel sticky or dry. feels like nothings there when dried up. one block can easily last me for 18 months. just wet your pits and 1 or 2 quick swipes and your done. no need to overdo it, cuz its just wasted. the deodorant effect lasts strong for a full 24 hours and somewhat into the next day or so even after a showering and no reapplying.
customer_reviews.author: L11

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS AWESOME PRODUCT! IT’S AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT Alum Block! It’s a lot bigger, and more solid than the $20 Alum Block that I paid $20 for from the grooming lounge website. It comes wrapped in plastic along with a plastic case that is nice to store it in after a shave, and to protect it from damage. It stops bleeding from cuts and prevents razor burn. No chalky mess like you’d get from a styptic pencil. It helps tremendously against shaving irritation as well. It’s very solid, and it’s very generous in size compared to ones I’ve paid a lot more for with the same results. I wish I had found this a lot sooner!!
customer_reviews.author: ProtectURSelf

customer_reviews.title: I'll never use styptic again!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wet shaving for a long time, with cartridges and even straight razors. In the past, I always used styptic to treat nicks and razor rash, because the local drugstores didn't carry alum. I've always wanted to try alum, however, and I finally had the presence of mind to search for it on Amazon. I used the Gentleman Jon block this morning on some weeping razor rash, and I will never use styptic again. The alum block is very effective, easier to apply and far more gentle—no painful stinging. It leaves a smooth, clean sensation; a great finish to your shave.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Jones

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: After only 3 weeks, chunks are breaking off. So imagine my surprise... It's 6am and after a fresh DE razor shave (with some minor nicks), I rubbed this alum block on my neck and it felt like sandpaper. Minor nicks felt like I was rubbing the end of a wooden 2x4 on my neck. The corners were sharp due to fresh chucks that had broken off. Real lovely feeling early in the morning. Don't buy this brand if you care about your face. What a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: audiom3

customer_reviews.title: Read Reviews First!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to help with razor burn on my legs and I can't say that I was thrilled about this product at first. Used as directed: wet the block, applied to legs, washed off. I didn't think that I had particularly sensitive skin but this BURNED and almost made the razor burn worse. After reading a review recommending lathering the alum block in your hands (like soap), rinsing for a second under cold water (to dilute), then apply made a world of difference! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Essential part of my wet shave now.
customer_reviews.text: Feel the burn! When using this as part of my post shave I no longer notice little weeping cuts that can sometimes happen with wet shaving. I wet the bar and rub it all over the area that i shaved, wait about 30 seconds and rinse off then proceed with my normal post shave ablutions. The bar is smaller than I expected but I think it will last a long time. Have been using it for about six weeks and do not notice a reduction in size at all. I am sure it will last more than a year with regular shaving.
customer_reviews.author: gagokano

customer_reviews.title: Great Block
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy this block came in one piece. I saw a lot of reviews where it came broken which was my only worry. I just tried it out on some razor burn I got from shaving a few days ago and it worked right away. It’s stung for a second on the more irritated section on my face but overall it was soothing. My only complaint if I had to say was that it is a tad sharp on the edge not sharp enough to cut but scratch a little. Just need to keep it flat and glide it slowly to avoid the sharp edge. Overall this was an awesome bang of my buck.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Valentin

customer_reviews.title: I'm almost disappointed I barely cut myself since the block is such ...
customer_reviews.text: Alum blocks are a pure must have for any shaver, it takes care of cuts and nicks fantastically. I'm almost disappointed I barely cut myself since the block is such a godsend. You get a nick and you apply a bit of water to the block and then apply it to the area, it stings for a bit (varies on how bad the cut is) and usually the cut is not only going to stop bleeding but also almost disappear (especially if smaller). I wish I knew about this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good middle of the road item
customer_reviews.text: Fairly new to the classic wet shave but this has been quite helpful. It tightens up the pores after my shave. I now would not want to shave without finishing with an alum block. I don’t have any experience with others however I feel like there is probably something better out there. One side of the block is a little rough and I would not run that on my face. I do like that this ones comes in a plastic box for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Bryfogle

customer_reviews.title: I like to pamper my face....:-)
customer_reviews.text: OK, so this is NOT the same thing as a typical styptic pencil. It does the same thing, but if you take care of it, then it will last a long time. Just wet your face and the block with cool water, then run it gently over your face. It will stop the little nicks from bleeding and nicely condition your face. I use each time I shave and I put on a nice alcohol free aftershave (not cologne) right after. Then a few minutes later I use a nice facial lotion. Your skin will stay soft and conditioned.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C

customer_reviews.title: Awkward rectangular shape hurts your face
customer_reviews.text: The only place I get shaving nicks is on my chin and neck, and this block just isn't the right shape to apply to those areas. The edges feel very sharp on your skin and it is really uncomfortable. This bar does an okay job of stopping any bleeding but it really is unpleasant to use unless you get a cut on a perfectly flat part of your face that you can gently slide the bar over. I would recommend styptic liquid or powder instead of alum blocks/bars like this. I haven't used it just for post-shave comfort as some other reviewers have, so there may be some value there.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this as an aftershave and bought another bar for deodorant. Works fabulously. Was surprised that I was able to use it as a deodorant. I live in the Arizona dessert and have had to always use industrial strength Mitchum. This works. I no longer have to put chemicals into my body through my armpits. As an aftershave, it does a wonderful job shrinking your pores and sealing any minor cuts you have. Again, don't need to put chemicals or in this case alcohol onto my face.
customer_reviews.author: Dave O'Grady

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but does dissolve and disintegrate over time and w/ uses.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Prevents razor burn and ingrown hairs. As I used it, it got smaller and smaller. When it was about half the size it was originally, a hole opened up inside it revealing a hollow crevice. It is now disintegrating with each use, but I'm still limping it by--no reason to throw it away when it still works. I think I'm going to try a solid alum block next (this one was made as a composite from smaller particles, it seems), to see if it lasts a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Wilstrong

customer_reviews.title: Good, cost effective replacement for aftershave
customer_reviews.text: I use this instead of aftershave, though I know some use both. I like that I don't have to worry about any additional scent clashing with a cologne if I use that. I had to throw my last block away when there was some left because it was crumbling, and I was nearly disappointed until I realized it'd taken 15 months to reach that point, making it far more cost effective than any aftershave I've bought before. Make sure you dry it thoroughly after each use, and try not to drop it, it's brittle.
customer_reviews.author: Jack W.

customer_reviews.title: Very rough and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This block was very rough on my skin even after a few weeks of using it every day. A block I've bought in the past from another company didn't have this problem at all. You would think that the rough areas would become smooth with use but it seems like as soon as one wears off two more form. Other than the roughness, the product works as designed...but I'd rather the razor burn honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Alum block slightly damaged, not perfect block
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this item... Don't get me wrong it does work and the block size is quite large compared to others and it does come with a container. However my block came with big pits/gouge holes on the sides. I like my goods to arrive in pristine condition but this one did not and I'm unable to return it. I did fix it by cutting almost half the block away to get a nice rectangular block, it's just how I roll. Things need to look right!
customer_reviews.author: Clint M. Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Must have for new DE shavers
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting the hang of Double edge safety razors, this alum block is a must have for beginners and experts. Wet your face and the block after shaving, and rub the block in a circle motion on your face. It will sanitize any small cuts you may have, and takes the burn and redness out of any raw areas after shaving. (Doesn't stop nicks as well as a Styptic pencil but it doesn't leave the white residue) it soothes your whole face after a shave. Afterwards splash your face with cold water, pat dry and use a non alcohol post shave balm and you'll be feeling great. (Even if your face was on fire minutes before)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for knicks and aftershave
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well to stop razor nicks from bleeding, though will struggle with larger cuts. Makes for a refreshing, minimal aftershave if you run it over your whole face after a shave. If you use a straight or safety razor you are going to need something like this. I've used it for a year and the bar is barely smaller than when I bought it, so there is a lot of use here.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: The cure that my sensitive neck has been searching for!
customer_reviews.text: I have a beard, but I shave my neck, and my neck is super sensitive. I've tried various different razors and shaving creams/gels to find relief from razor burn. Nothing has worked. I then heard of alum blocks, so I bought this one kind of on a whim. Glad I did! No more red spots covering my neck! The block is very affordable, and in my time using it, it seems the block would likely last over a year. Definitely getting my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Mackall

customer_reviews.title: Rough surfaces need smoothing before applying to open cuts.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first alum block, so maybe they are all this way. Between the marks from the saw used to cut out these blocks, a side of sharp crystals and the trapped bubbles, I recommend you wet the block and smooth as many surfaces as possible before applying to an open cut. Works for minor irritations and very small scrapes.
customer_reviews.author: SeanA

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had discovered it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known about alum when I first started shaving as a teen...would have saved a lot of razor burn, pimples and pain. Actually had someone tell me I have a “baby face” the other day and I’m 39 years old with a heavy beard! This stuff works miracles for those of us who have heavy growth, sensitive skin and have to shave every day for work.
customer_reviews.author: KSminibike

customer_reviews.title: sorta works
customer_reviews.text: This does help stop moderate bleeding. If you got a bad bleeder you'll need a pencil. It's rough the first few uses until it wears down. It has a little case to hold it but mine broke with very little pressure opening it. It doesn't do much for my inflammation and actually makes me look like I'm breaking out.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes really need to rub it in
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to have a big alum block, in comparison to the alum pen I was using, and it works well. At times it feels like I need to rub it in a little more than with other alum products I've used, but it does help to stop the bleeding and razor burn after a shave.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Completely surprised and satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought this a long, long time ago! I use it exactly as directed- rinse the bar and apply it to your wet face after shaving. I couldn’t believe how smooth my face felt after I rinsed the product off. It was completely night and day compared to not using it. I won’t be without this alum block again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Angell

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with my first straight razor because I figured I’d cut my face at least a couple of times and my god did this come in nicely. I tried to wait until I was finished shaving to use it, but there was one cut that was getting blood everywhere. As soon as I put this on on the cut (I ran it under hot water first not sure if you’re supposed to) the bleeding stopped immediately. It stings a little, but it’s worth it
customer_reviews.author: Rudolph Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Full of voids, sharp edges, crumbles, falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Product disintegrated in the first 2 weeks, full of internal voids. Sharp edges all over the place as it crumbles apart every time I pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: TmBc

customer_reviews.title: A must have product if you shave
customer_reviews.text: It saddens me to think how many nicks and cuts i have endured over the years without this product. Just run it under cold water for 10 seconds and hold on a facial cut for 1-2 minutes and the bleeding stops. Awesome! Be sure to dry the block after use to get the longest use life.
customer_reviews.author: NHB3

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Is an alum block, no much to it, I use it only on bad shave days (when I shave in a hurry usually) I’ve seen reviews than it crumbles or brakes into pieces if droped, for me is doing the job perfectly and seems I will most likely wont buy another one any time soon and that is a good thing, it seems is gonna last a very long time
customer_reviews.author: yariana

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This is a Must Have if your a wet shaver as far as I'm concerned! Gentleman Jon Alum Block is the best value for your money that I could find at this time and I'll stick with this brand. It works great and will last me a long time. I'm a beginner and I knick myself from time to time. Also a little razor burn. This stuff works great for me. Instant relief. After shaving I run the block under water for a second and glide it along all over my face and neck. What a relief! Stops any bleeding. Then, I ask myself, why do I do this?(wet shave)
customer_reviews.author: Richard C Bimson

customer_reviews.title: Size of a hotel bar of soap, but thicker
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched from shaving with a DE razor to a straight edge and a final pass with alum helps reduce the irritation and helps stop the bleeding from the small cuts. This product works just fine and has a handy plastic box. What others fail to note is how small this is. At 3.7 ounces, I thought this would be the size of a regular bar of soap. It is not. This product is about the size of a bar of hotel soap and maybe twice as thick. Calibrate your expectations. Works fine and will likely last for some time
customer_reviews.author: Byron Eisemann

customer_reviews.title: and I love it. It has dramatically reduced the amount of ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after hearing a reddit recommendation, and I love it. It has dramatically reduced the amount of razor burn I get. It has additionally help reduce the amount of micro cuts I get from shaving. I was never aware of how after I got nearly unnoticeable cuts that could get infected until I used this. It does burn a little bit, but nothing like using rubbing alcohol. However, the slight burn helps keep you aware of when you're using bad shaving techniques, and fades away pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Zane

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing. Makes my face feel great
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. Makes my face feel great. I can't imagine life without it. I'm a touring Musician in the public eye. I want to share this great little block with everyone I meet backstage. I put it on my face 3 times today, then again to get in the mood to play. So great. I love it. How do I get an Endorsement like I have with Ernie Ball Guitars!? Shaving Soaps kick butt too. Don't buy anything but Gentleman Jon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a styptic pen for decades. Wish I had purchased this block decades ago. I wet the block and rub it on my face after a shave, even when I have no nicks or cuts. It's amazing. Closes up pores instantly. I applied my aftershave after using this alum block and the difference was amazing. Usually my aftershave stings a little but if I use the alum block first there is no stinging sensation whatsoever. Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: When I got there product there was a large void in the side of the block, however, I was contacted immediately by customer service and just received a replacement and a puck of shaving soap! The Gentleman Jon alum block I use each morning, the company I will continue to support. Great product, great support!!
customer_reviews.author: David J

customer_reviews.title: Makes shaving ALOT better on the skin
customer_reviews.text: Makes shaving ALOT better on the skin. After application I put on aftershave (with alcohol) and no burn! Its great. Only beef is its WAY smaller than it looks in the pictures. Its about the size of two Zippos stacked on top of each other, but it will still probably last a long time...
customer_reviews.author: Joel MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Product is very nice.
customer_reviews.text: It works well to get rid of the bleeding nicks and cuts from shaving, prefer it over other alternatives. It also does one very important thing for me is it helps keep my shaven head from sweating a lot. This is one of my must own products along with a shave stick that makes life better for head shavers.
customer_reviews.author: Yoduh

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great for my skin. It works as advertised and keeps my skin smooth after I shave with my double edge safety razor. I've had issues with razor bumps in the past and have fairly sensitive skin and curly hair, so this alum block maintains a constant presence in my morning routine.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Does a terrific job as an under arm deodorant without the tell-tale ...
customer_reviews.text: Does a terrific job as an under arm deodorant without the tell-tale stains that most deodorants leave. Not only does it work, a bar of this lasts, and lasts. I mean several months. If your BO is overbearing, hold the bar under hot running water for a few seconds and apply it . JMTC....
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: For me, this didn't work. I hardly get any nicks now but when I did, applying this didn't work. For those wanting to know more. Comes in a nice small container. Wet it first to use. May sting a little. I now use coconut oil if any irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Babi Gendut

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now if you were Shave!
customer_reviews.text: So let's start with the basics. When wet shaving, you NEED alum to treat those Nick's and cuts you accrue as a first timer. Secondly, the cool refreshing feel of alum against razor burn or a freshly shaved face is as good as any aftershave in my opinion. This stuff works wonders, indulge. As far as the design and the case, it's a nice tight seal that keeps the block dry. I personally enjoy the squared off block design, because as you use it, it rounds out to your face as the alum is worn.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Melton

customer_reviews.title: Great product, love alum blocks now.
customer_reviews.text: Just used a few times however it is quite good quality. It works as I can feel the sting where cuts are but it stings less than aftershaves which I also apply with this. No bad smell or any irritation, in fact it fixes any cuts razor bumps etc. Does seem to dry out the skin a bit more than not using it at all, however lotion can fix that.
customer_reviews.author: Arshdeep Hanjra

customer_reviews.title: Super Effective
customer_reviews.text: I don't use any styptic tools other than this. It takes care of little weepers no problem. It is a go-to for me and lasts a long time. Daily shaving for me this lasts over a year easy. Highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Will last longer with proper care
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful block, definitely a must have if you frequently experience razor burn like myself, This block is intended to be wet/soaked before use, then dried off and put in an area where air flows freely after use, if you soak it then put it back into a closed container it will fall apart
customer_reviews.author: JackM62103

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT ALUM!!! GLAD MY PURCHASE OF ANOTHER BRAND CAME BROKEN!! CASE IS EXCELLENT TOO! THE BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: Needed Alum for after shaving. I purchased another brand because it was less expensive but it arrived in a few pieces so then I order the Gentleman Jon because it came in a plastic case and it arrived in one piece and I use it daily and it is very convenient too have the case with the Alum. It seems too last for ever but I ordered another just for when it does disappear. After I shave with my straight or safety razor and my Face is still wet I rub this all over my Face. I wait a few seconds and wash off and apply my aftershave, or lotion
customer_reviews.author: Averagejoe

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price, but not as effective as styptic pencils/powder
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't work as good as a typical styptic pencil or power. Styptics are made of Alum, but I believe they are ground up (and reconstituted in the case of pencils) so that they act more immediately than this alum block does. For comparison, a styptic pencil will sting like heck as soon as it touches a razor nick, but the blood clots almost immediately. With this block, you can wet it and rub it on a nick. It may or may not sting, and it will take several passes before you start to see any indication of clotting.
customer_reviews.author: Brent L. Bordelon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit that this is the only alum block I've tried. That said, it's the best post-shaving product I've ever used. I believe it to be highly durable, and though it's not as big as I thought it would be, I've had mine for a while now and it hasn't visibly shrunk yet. I highly recommend this alum bar as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Radle

customer_reviews.title: So worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. FYI it will hurt a lot to put it on but it gets rid of redness and irritation so well, even got rid of some of my rashes! It lasts forever and the packaging is superb. It's also such a great value! Overall so worth it
customer_reviews.author: Andy Smith

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about this type of product. I'm used to always bleed after shaving I have sensitive skin, but this literally stops bleedings. It's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Guille Pozzi

customer_reviews.title: Can't fault the product for my biology so I'll just say that it works great for me as an unscented deodorant and if I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am now under the full impression that I might have a minor allergic reaction to alum. This does the job of closing up my pores and stopping weepers but it turns my face bright red. I've even tried it on my skin before I shave to see if it wasn't just me butchering my skin with my DE blade and I got the same reaction. Can't fault the product for my biology so I'll just say that it works great for me as an unscented deodorant and if I need to get my fingers extra-grippy on my razor. Shipping was fast and the product came undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: f l e X `

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Alum
customer_reviews.text: Alum blocks are critical for preventing razorburn and this block works great. I like that it came with a plastic case, though the case broke the first time I dropped it with the block inside it onto the floor. The block survived though, so I guess the case did its job.
customer_reviews.author: Conner

customer_reviews.title: Great seller!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this item some time back and just got the chance to write a review. I am still using this product, it is amazing and 100% organic! The seller provided exceptional and fast shipping service. I am pleased with this purchase. Definitely worth buying again! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Sabah

customer_reviews.title: Actually helps fight razor burn
customer_reviews.text: Does a fantastic job of helping clear razor burns after you shave (and I use an electric shaver). It can burn a little if you've cut yourself, but I suppose that is to be expected. I would love to use this more, but it adds additional time to my morning routine and living with a roommate, I can't commandeer the bathroom for as much time as I'd like to.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic old school working stuff
customer_reviews.text: Simply fantastic....it does it’s job....sto bleeding! It is a man stuff .... not for people that prefer a gentle touch ... but it work! The best old smell!
customer_reviews.author: psycho

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This alum block works great at closing up small nicks, and weepers. Any small nicks will stop bleeding right away. A small block like this seems to last for a long time. I highly recommend after a shave if you get small cuts and nicks.
customer_reviews.author: Ga Boy

customer_reviews.title: Bit difrant so far i like compared to useing aftershave iv used in past and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bit difrant so far i like compared to useing aftershave iv used in past and price is great iv had my bar for 3month and still going i would used most all my regular aftershave by now so cant beat price and how well seem work on me every1 difrant So may worl great for me may not work for you but try it regardless could fix lot skin problem cause by shaving from.some reviews iv seem that and articles i read
customer_reviews.author: Chris jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great price
customer_reviews.text: Alum blocks really do make a difference when shaving. Especially when using safety (DE) razors. While the product is simple, most brands want to charge you $15+ Which I would love to see the margin they make with each one of those purchases. I went with Gentleman Jon because the price was right and the Plastic case is perfect for traveling. I highly recommend this product. It will stop the bleeding and tighten up the skin with out drying it out. Just wait a few minutes before putting on the after shave balm as your pores will be closed after using this and will not soak in the balm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in one piece
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews with complaints about the Alum arriving broken. I'm glad I took a chance in ordering it because mine arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Y.

customer_reviews.title: Works insanely well!
customer_reviews.text: Good lawd, how have I gone this long without using this? I had no idea how raw my face was after shaving. Use this bar and my face feels like silk.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey T. worthen

customer_reviews.title: Feel the burn.
customer_reviews.text: Of course ideally you don't want to feel the burn, because that means you had a great shave. Works to stop the bleeding, fight off ingrown hairs, tighten the skin, and I also use it as a natural deodorant.
customer_reviews.author: Troutbum

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than anticipated but happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I guess I didn't know how small 3.7 ounces was when I bought it-- I imagined it would be the size of a standard bar of soap, but it was a little smaller. It's my first time using this product of any brand, so I can't speak much to how it holds up to competitors. I've use it once and so far I'm happy with the results. Hopeful it helps with irritation over time.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different brand
customer_reviews.text: This “bar” is just bits of alum smashed together. After five weeks, it has mostly crumbled and washed down the drain. Yes, I have kept it dry.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Tyson

customer_reviews.title: A good alum block in a convenient case.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size in my opinion, Big enough to hold and also get the job done efficiently. I don’t see the benefit of the chapstick-like versions. Easy to get in and out of its plastic holder, which helps keep things clean. Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Pan

customer_reviews.title: best deal
customer_reviews.text: Alum bars work great, very good for your skin and healthier than alcohol after shaves.. rinse your face after your shave with hot water, wet your alum bar, rub your face down with it, you'll feel the stings and will stop miner nick bleeding, let sit for a moment then rinse your face with cold water, closing the pours.. Your face will love it.. You can get alum bars anywhere, but not this size with a plastic travel case for even close to this price, this is the best deal going. Highly recommend..
customer_reviews.author: Robert Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Block
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid crystal block, not the porous precipitate that stypitic pencils are. Great case.
customer_reviews.author: random Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly it works
customer_reviews.text: I would have never thought that rubbing it on fresh shaved skin would help, but it does!
customer_reviews.author: T-Dubbs

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: You can really feel this working immediately after you use it. Its odorless and clean and for the money its so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Overton Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Good size and functional travel case. Works great and no skin irritation so i don’t even need to rinse off after use.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Isaacson

customer_reviews.title: First time user
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I ever used an Alum block. Since I have started learning the finer points of wet shaving I appreciate what this product does. Who knew I was doing things wrong for 28 years. Live and learn
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: broken case can't be replaced. (took care of in the end)
customer_reviews.text: I am really pissed that this arrived in a broken case and there is no option to return or replace... I shouldn't have to pay for this update: after contacting Amazon and speaking to a representative I got a refund... also gentlemen Jon replied and offered to send me a replacement. i understand things happen and I was taken care of in the end. product works very well and is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Much better than a styptic pen
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this alum bar, as it works well to cauterize cuts, but doesn't dry the skin as much. It does not hurt as bad as the styptic pen and it lasts much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Carr

customer_reviews.title: Natural Deodrant
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a deodorant, even better than traditional antiperspirants. I spray my armpits with rose water and swipe the block a couple times. The case is very handy. This product lasts a very long time. Can't go wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Niya

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: It's a block of alum and it does what it should. It should last a long time and I'll buy this one again when it does eventually run out
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: One end is hollow
customer_reviews.text: Nice big chuck of Alum, but one end of the stone is crumbling and a bit hollow. It will still last many years, but I was disappointed in not getting a solid crystal block. I wouldn't buy this product again. Crystal natural deodorant stones are a better option. They are cheap, made of the same material and are actually a solid crystal.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This alum block is my first but I've tried other shave cut remedies and this beats them all. No white residue or stubborn aplicator rollers. Very little sting, if any. This block provides soothing relief of cuts or razor burns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A perfect addition for any wet shaver.....
customer_reviews.text: Great product and price. Highly recommend for anyone looking to upgrade their shaving experience.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Lo

customer_reviews.title: The block is pretty small. Just thought it would be a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because some people said they used it for underarm deodorant/antiperspirant. It seems to work. The block is pretty small. Just thought it would be a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Bob C.

customer_reviews.title: The sting tells you that its working!
customer_reviews.text: This badboy works great, Loved the History behind this Rock, The Romans would use it to treat wounds and purify water.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Gentleman Jon alum block
customer_reviews.text: come in a plastic carry box so it will keep well, is a great size and will last and best of all it is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful classic style/label and very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully priced alum block. Why would anyone purchase something like this from a big brand like "The Art of Shaving" for something like $30 when there are products like this one for just a few dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Impalex

customer_reviews.title: WHAT CAN I SAY. GOOD STUFF
customer_reviews.text: WHERE HAVE YOU BEEN ALL MY LIFE. WOW, THIS IS GOOD STUFF. NO MORE GREASY CREAMS, GELS!!! IF YOU TRY IT YOU WILL BE HOOKED. IT LAST FOR EVER.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Benge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Gentleman Jon alum blocks are of excellent quality. The block itself is rounded on the edges and smooth. It is a little smaller than a typical bar of soap and comes in a well built plastic case. After a shave simply wet the block and rub all over your face. You will notice a mild burn followed by total calm. Excellent if you easily get razor burn from sensitive skin and will disinfect knicks and stop bleeding. It leaves me feeling smooth with no more burn.
customer_reviews.author: Danil Chul

customer_reviews.title: It's an Alum Block with a good storage and/or travel case.  Not much else to say.
customer_reviews.text: It's an Alum Block so not much to review. I suppose if you want to nit-pick, mine was not evenly cut so not super smooth (not aperfect rectangle cube) to rub on the skin, but smooth enough to use. The plastic case makes it handy to store and travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Billy B

customer_reviews.title: I like that it comes in a plastic case since it ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that it comes in a plastic case since it doesn't make a mess and it's easy to travel with. I definitly noticed a reduction in skin rash after using this product for a while. It's my understanding that all of these blocks are fragile and chip easily so I didn't want to give it a bad rating, but my did come slightly damaged and what scratched me a few times. I hope that the next one I order is not the same case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this is a great deal for the amount of alum you get
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the competition, this is a great deal for the amount of alum you get. But you can get more for less buying Thai Crystal or Crystal Essence, and because they come in stick form, they are smoother on the skin and easier to handle.
customer_reviews.author: MarLo

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest for a reason
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for. This looks like alum stone rejects are some composite. I've bought the Osma one before and it looked like a quartz crystal. This looks like dust smashed together. I don't think it will last long
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Barbero is better - this one is ok
customer_reviews.text: The box is difficult to open. Not a very high quality bar.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Smith

customer_reviews.title: Must have in your shaving kit if you wet shave!
customer_reviews.text: Oh I love it. I use it everyday after the shave. Hope it is not bad to use it this much but it works. I rinse it off with water a couple of minutes later and apply a balm after shave.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay Singh

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have found this years ago!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm fairly new to shaving as I started shaving my head 2 years ago finally. After years of searching for special after shave or lotions to prevent razor burn and bumps, countless dollars spent when the solution was an 8 dollar alum block. A little cold water and rub of this on my scalp and I'm bump free.
customer_reviews.author: D Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. I run warm water over it and just rub it over the freshly-shaved areas of my face to reduce bleeding and razor-burn. Using this with Proraso, a DE razor with some good blades, and short, light strokes has done more to improve my shaves and post-shaves than a ton of other expensive products could.
customer_reviews.author: relevantslim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Instantly stops bleeding from minor cuts while shaving. Leaves my face feeling tight.
customer_reviews.author: John Corley

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: For me it stops tiny cuts better than styptic pencil.
customer_reviews.author: BDJones

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: You get a hefty chunk of alum for the price. The bar looks like it will hold up for quite some time with every day use. Soothes the skin without leaving a visible residue. I would definitely buy another without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: If you've never used this, try it, you'll like it.
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, after shavig for 40 plus years, I never used an alum block. Now I use it daily on my face and head with cool water after shaving. It only takes a few seconds to apply finishing touches on a good shave. The alum when used with cold water is supposed to close your skin pores and seal any minor cuts or abrasions. I also like the fact this product comes with its own storage case.
customer_reviews.author: Z MAN

customer_reviews.title: So much nicer than using a styptic pencil!
customer_reviews.text: So much better than a styptic pencil! Terrific product - bought one for myself and one for my son who's now having issues with shaving and razor burn. He received the equivalent of a demerit for ROTC for not shaving one day because of razor burn and bleeding, despite having good quality shave cream and sharp, high-quality razor cartridges. This has worked beautifully for him.
customer_reviews.author: Old Kook Skater

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: Helps stop the bleeding from cuts during shaving, and reduces razor burn. I would say its a great product when you do shave in a hurry, but it dries up my face. Taking your time to get a better shave is more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great alum block and a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great alum block and a good price. If you rub this on your face after a shave while your face is still wet, say goodbye to ingrown hairs and razor burn. This block should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: gate

customer_reviews.title: Great and affordable
customer_reviews.text: A very good product once it arrived. Not slimy, leaves skin smooth. Didn't do too much to stop a few nicks, but it definitely helped. Size is a little more than an inch in width. The plastic case it came with is perfect for storage once your done using it, although the durability leaves a bit to be desired. Overall, the actual alum block is great.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. M. Lassalle

customer_reviews.title: No irritation... but leaves my skin dry
customer_reviews.text: This wonderful product is like a magic wand. Just get it a little wet, rub it all over your face, and the irritation is gone! It does, however, leave my skin a little dry... nothing that a little moisturizer won't help. Update: After six months of daily use the alum block began to crumble and break apart. Wish it had lasted longer but still a pretty good value.
customer_reviews.author: Ilya

customer_reviews.title: Sooths the skin
customer_reviews.text: Very good alum block. Gently run it over your face/legs (or wherever you shaved) to sooth your skin, keep for 30 seconds, then rinse off.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: Handy case
customer_reviews.text: Liked the carrying case. Very nice for storage or travel.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer
